Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers

Class SchoolPawnManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.Manager
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.SchoolPawnManager
public class SchoolPawnManager extends Manager
Class that contains all the methods that change the location of student pawns and professor pawns.

  • Method Details

    • pickStudentsFromBag

      public ArrayList<StudentDisc> pickStudentsFromBag(int numOfStudents) throws TableNotSetException, EmptyBagException
      Draws numOfStudents student discs from the bag. Throws TableNotSetException if the table is not set, EmptyBagException if it is not possible to draw numOfStudents student discs.
      Parameters:
      numOfStudents - the number of student discs to draw from the bag
      Returns:
      the list of student disc drawn
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if the table is not set
      EmptyBagException - if the bag does not contain the required number of student discs
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc
      • Bag
      • Table

    • moveStudentsFromBagToCloud

      public void moveStudentsFromBagToCloud(int numOfStudents, int cloudId) throws TableNotSetException, EmptyBagException, NoSuchElementException
      Takes numOfStudents student discs from the bag and moves them to the cloud tile with the id specified by cloudId. Throws TableNotSetException if the table is not set, EmptyBagException if it is not possible to draw numOfStudents student discs, NoSuchElementException if the required cloud tile could not be found.
      Parameters:
      numOfStudents - the number of student discs to move from the bag to the cloud tile
      cloudId - the identifier of the cloud tile
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if the table is not set
      EmptyBagException - if the bag does not contain the required number of student discs
      NoSuchElementException - if the required cloud tile could not be found
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc
      • Bag
      • CloudTile
      • Table

    • moveStudentFromEntranceToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentFromEntranceToDiningRoom(int playerId, int studentId) throws SchoolBoardNotSetException, NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException
      Moves the required student disc from the Entrance to the Dining Room of the school board of the player identified by playerId. Throws SchoolBoardNotSetException if the school board of the player has not been set, NoSuchElementException if the student disc could not be found in the entrance of the school board. Gives the coin if the position of the student gives it.

      The student is moved only if the table is not full.

      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player who owns the school board
      studentId - the identifier of the student disc to move
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if the school board of the player has not been set
      NoSuchElementException - if the student disc could not be found in the entrance of the school board
      IllegalArgumentException - if the table is full
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc
      • SchoolBoard
      • Player

    • moveStudentFromEntranceToIsland

      public void moveStudentFromEntranceToIsland(int playerId, int studentId, int islandId) throws SchoolBoardNotSetException, NoSuchElementException, TableNotSetException
      Moves the student disc identified by studentId from the entrance of the school board of the player playerId to the island with id islandId. Throws SchoolBoardNotSetException if the school board of the player has not been set, NoSuchElementException if the student disc could not be found in the entrance of the school board or if the required island tile could not be found, TableNotSetException if the table has not been set.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player who owns the school board
      studentId - the identifier of the student disc to move
      islandId - the identifier of the island tile where the student disc has to be moved to
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if the school board of the player has not been set
      NoSuchElementException - if the student disc could not be found in the entrance of the school board or if the required island tile could not be found
      TableNotSetException - if the table has not been set
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc
      • SchoolBoard
      • Player
      • IslandTile
      • Table

    • moveStudentsFromCloudTileToEntrance

      public void moveStudentsFromCloudTileToEntrance(int playerId, int cloudId) throws SchoolBoardNotSetException, NoSuchElementException, TableNotSetException
      Moves the student discs from the cloud tile specified by cloudId to the entrance of the school board of the player with id playerId. Throws SchoolBoardNotSetException if the school board of the player has not been set, NoSuchElementException if the required cloud tile could not be found, TableNotSetException if the table has not been set.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player who owns the school board
      cloudId - the identifier of the cloud tile
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if the school board of the player has not been set
      NoSuchElementException - if the required cloud tile could not be found
      TableNotSetException - if the table has not been set
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc
      • SchoolBoard
      • Player
      • CloudTile
      • Table

    • moveProfessor

      public void moveProfessor(int receivingTeamId, int losingTeamId, PawnColor color) throws NoSuchElementException
      Moves the professor with color color from the team with losingTeamId to the team with receivingTeamId. Throws NoSuchElementException if any of the two teams could not be found.
      Parameters:
      receivingTeamId - the identifier of the receiving team
      losingTeamId - the identifier of the team losing the professor pawn
      color - the color of the professor pawn
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if any of the two teams could not be found
      See Also:
      • ProfessorPawn
      • Team

    • getIslandStudents

      public ArrayList<StudentDisc> getIslandStudents(int islandId) throws TableNotSetException, NoSuchElementException
      Returns the StudentDiscs on the IslandTile whose id is islandId.
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the Island where the Students have to be grabbed
      Returns:
      ArrayList with StudentDisc present on the Island
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine
      NoSuchElementException - if the required island tile could not be found
